message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value it brings, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Looking forward to your response.

Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your position, but $10,000 is too low for me. I could consider letting it go for $15,000. This is a very fair price considering the value you'll get from it.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I believe $12,000 would be a fair price for the product given its value to me. Please let me know if we can come to an agreement.
